message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $12,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your valuation, but I believe I can find similar value at a lower cost. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,500 for the product.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I value your interest, my price reflects the true worth and potential of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway â€“ how about $10,750?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,250.
